channel.title: Euro-scape
channel.description: 21 skills to train 9 minigames to compete in 15 bosses to fight against with their unique drops and attacks User-friendly skilling area Perfectly working lottery system that saves the amount that has been put into the lottery User-friendly teleporting interface No advertisement when playing All the dupes patched Regular content updates Over 200 armor sets to choose from over 500 npcs to battle against Unique bleeding effect Professional npc dialogues A userfriendly webclient that loads in less than a minute 2 Types of prayer : Curses and Normal prayers 3 Types of magic books : Lunar, Ancient, Normal User-friendly Staff Hosted on a dedicated server 24/7 Fully working highscore ( Under update ) Fully working voting system Fully working auto donation system Over 30 shops to discover Mini-quests vBulletin forum Donator features Clue scrolls Overloads + Extremes [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/11bnqz5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rp8gag.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/ctjwg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/sl08xi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/z26o9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/24edyxy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2h49tmp.png[/img] euro-scape.org. come play quickly. free chaotic mauls for a limited time!

omfgsfdgfdg chaotics, primurs, omg phr33rftgretgr chaotics?? nowaiii! omfg best server?omfgomaigod.!!! orgasmomg perfect d claws and agsss specses? omfg no wai! best serva??omgnowaijoining

Anyway…try to add something besides that. Sorry if that was rude, but seriously? It almost makes me want to punch the fuck out of my computer screen when i see that. lol. ALSO: i’m assuming that a player made this thread, and also is of young age. Sorry if you are not 10, but it looks like it… (the way you advertised.) the primal and stuff every pi has.

item.title: Euro-scape
item.dc:creator: @byronsh byronsh
item.description:
@byronsh wrote:

21 skills to train
9 minigames to compete in
15 bosses to fight against with their unique drops and attacks
User-friendly skilling area
Perfectly working lottery system that saves the amount that has been put into the lottery
User-friendly teleporting interface
No advertisement when playing
All the dupes patched
Regular content updates
Over 200 armor sets to choose from
over 500 npcs to battle against
Unique bleeding effect
Professional npc dialogues
A userfriendly webclient that loads in less than a minute
2 Types of prayer : Curses and Normal prayers
3 Types of magic books : Lunar, Ancient, Normal
User-friendly Staff
Hosted on a dedicated server 24/7
Fully working highscore ( Under update )
Fully working voting system
Fully working auto donation system
Over 30 shops to discover
Mini-quests
vBulletin forum
Donator features
Clue scrolls
Overloads + Extremes
